children.text: The number one place to meet other people who like NITW.

Welcome to Night in the Woods amino, just the place for all things NITW, obviously. Here you can meet other people who like Night in the Woods, make Night in the woods content, etc. We're always open for new members, and could always use a few. So stop on by and have some fun! Or not, it's up to you really.

>Credit goes to Trex for the category icons<
